Class CarDAO

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.epam.labs.dao.AbstractDAO<Car>
      • com.epam.labs.dao.CarDAO

  • public class CarDAO
extends AbstractDAO<Car>
    Class to implement all necessary methods to database access for car entity
